English:
This debuff's Pain damage is equal to 10% of the user's max Healing Gauge. 
When attacking, apply 1 stack of "Flame Affix" debuff to one target (<sprite=1>&a%). 
When receiving Pain damage from "Flame Affix" debuff, generate Candlelight Barrier equal to the stacks of Candle Affix. 
Removed when healed. |
     <color=#919191>Ⅱ</color> 
Removed and heals HP equal to half of base damage when at Death's Door.
Chinese:
此减益的痛苦伤害为10%使用者最大体力值。
攻击命中时对目标之一施加一层“火焰附加”减益(<sprite=1>&a%)。
受到来自“火焰附加”减益的痛苦伤害时，生成等同于烛光附加减益层数的烛火屏障。
受到治疗后解除。|
    <color=#919191>Ⅱ</color>
濒死时解除并治疗相当于基础伤害一半的生命值。

English:
When attacking, apply 1 stack of "Flame Affix" debuff to target (<sprite=1>&a%). 
Reduced by 1 stack upon successful application.
Chinese:
攻击命中时对目标施加一层“火焰附加”减益(<sprite=1>&a%)。
施加成功时减少一层。

English:
When attacking Candlelight Barrier, take Pain damage equal to &user's Pain Resistance * Attack Power (&a). 
If the attack destroys the barrier, take an additional instance of the above damage. | 
    <color=#919191>Ⅲ</color> 
Damage multiplier changes from Attack Power to max Healing Gauge.
Chinese:
攻击烛火屏障时，受到&user痛苦抵抗力*攻击力的伤害(&a)。
若该次攻击使烛火屏障被破坏，额外受到一次上述伤害。| 
    <color=#919191>Ⅲ</color>
伤害系数由攻击力变为最大体力值。

English: Increases the number of debuff stacks applied to targets by skills by 1. Reduced by 1 stack after triggering.
Chinese: 技能给予目标的减益层数额外增加一层。触发后减少一层。

English: When attacked with Candlelight Barrier active, has <sprite=2>&a% chance (60% + &user's <sprite=1> Resistance%) to stun the attacking enemy.
Chinese: 烛火屏障存在的情况下被攻击时，有<sprite=2>&a%成功率（60%+&user<sprite=1>抵抗力%）令攻击来源敌人进入眩晕状态。

English: When attacked, increases damage of "Target Enemy" skills in hand by the amount reduced by Candlelight Barrier.
Chinese: 自身受到攻击时，手牌中“指向敌人”技能的伤害量将增加烛火屏障减少的数值。

English: When receiving any debuff while Candlelight Barrier is active, reduce that debuff's duration by 1 turn (minimum 1 turn).
Chinese: 烛火屏障存在的情况下被赋予任意减益时，那个减益的持续回合数减少1回合。（最低减少至1回合）

English:
When entering Death's Door, consume 1 stack to generate Candlelight Barrier equal to 20% of max Healing Gauge. | 
    <color=#919191>Ⅰ</color> 
Does not consume buff stacks when triggered.
Chinese:
自身进入濒死状态时，消耗一层增益，生成最大体力值20%的烛火屏障。|
    <color=#919191>Ⅰ</color>
触发时不再消耗增益层数。

English:
When entering Death's Door or ending turn at Death's Door, transfer all debuffs from self to &user. Transferred debuffs are treated as enemy-applied. 
Does not affect unremovable debuffs. | 
    <color=#919191>Ⅳ</color> 
Also generates Candlelight Barrier equal to 20% of max Healing Gauge.
Chinese:
进入濒死状态或回合结束时处于濒死状态时，自身拥有的所有减益将转移到&user，转移的减益视为敌人赋予。
对无法解除的减益不生效。|
    <color=#919191>Ⅳ</color>
将同时生成自身最大体力值20%的烛火屏障。

English: Gain 1 additional stack of "Mirage" at turn start.
Chinese: 回合开始时，额外获得一层“蜃楼”。

优先攻击&target。|
    <color=#919191>Ⅴ</color>
成功率变为150%。

English: When Candlelight Barrier is destroyed, gain Healing Gauge Protection for 2 turns.
Chinese: 烛火屏障被破坏时，保护体力极限2回合。

English: Gain +2% Attack and max HP for each Curse skill &a in deck.
Chinese: 牌库中每有一张诅咒技能&a，攻击力和最大生命值+2%。

English:
Damage taken -10%. 
When having at least 3 debuff stacks, damage taken becomes -25%.
Chinese:
受到伤害-10%。
烛身上的减益层数不低于3时，受到伤害改为-25%。

English: When allies other than self receive debuffs, remove them and transfer to Candle.
Chinese: 自身以外的队员被施加减益时，解除改减益并转为施加给烛。

English: When allies other than self receive debuffs, remove them and transfer to Candle.
Chinese: 自身以外的队员被施加减益时，解除改减益并转为施加给烛。

English: In Mirage Candle Shadow, debuff targets change from "Candle" to all allies. Synchronized debuffs apply to all enemies. Debuffs cannot be resisted.
Chinese: 蜃楼烛中影中被施加减益的对象条件由“烛”变为全体友军，同步施加减益的对象将变为全体敌人。减益施加时不会被抵抗。

English:
On cast: For each debuff on self, damage taken -3%. 
When Candlelight Barrier is destroyed, increase barrier by &a (self Level + number of debuffs).
Chinese:
释放时，自身每承受一个减益，所受伤害-3%
烛火屏障被破坏时，烛火屏障增加&a(自身Lv数+承受减益数量)点。

English:
Candlelight Thorns III: Damage multiplier changes from Attack Power to max Healing Gauge. 
Candlelight Protection IV: Also generates Candlelight Barrier equal to 20% of max Healing Gauge. 
Candlelight Pull V: Success rate: 150%. 
Candlelight Mending I: No longer consumes buff stacks when triggered. 
Candle Affix II: Removes and heals HP equal to half of base damage when at Death's Door.
Chinese:
烛光荆棘Ⅲ：伤害系数由攻击力变为最大体力值。
烛光保护Ⅳ：将同时生成自身最大体力值20%的烛火屏障。
烛光牵引Ⅴ：成功率：150%
烛光修补Ⅰ：触发时不再消耗增益层数。
烛光附加Ⅱ：濒死时解除并治疗相当于基础伤害一半的生命值。

English: Special protective wall generated by exclusive skills. When attacked, Candlelight Barrier is consumed first.
Chinese: 由专属技能生成的特殊防护墙，防护墙受到攻击时，优先消耗烛火屏障的防护值。

English: While active, provides Defense based on total number of buffs/debuffs.
Chinese: 生效时，根据拥有的增益、减益总数提供防御力。

English: When &target uses a skill, apply "Encouraging Dedication" with 20% healing effectiveness.
Chinese: &Target释放技能时，以20%治疗量对其使用一次“奉献的鼓励”。

English: Mystic Shield: Can block Pain damage.
Chinese: 神秘护盾：可以抵挡痛苦伤害。

English: When healing grants max Healing Gauge or Mystic Shield through passive, gain 1 Fan Service stack: All skills in hand cost -1 Mana this turn. Reduced by 1 stack after use.
Chinese: 治疗时每给予一次被动能力的最大体力值或神秘护盾时，获得一层粉丝服务增益：此回合内手牌中所有技能消耗法力值-1，释放后减少一层。

English:
At turn start, gain 1 "Mirage" stack: Debuffs targeting allies are redirected to Candle. 
Candle Reflection: When enemies apply debuffs to Candle, same debuffs are mirrored back to source. 
Passive doesn't affect unremovable debuffs. 

Lv3: Consuming "Mirage" stacks heals 15% max HP.
Chinese:
回合开始时，获得一层“蜃楼”：自身以外的队员被施加减益时，减益的施加对象将会转变为烛。
烛影反射：敌人对烛施加减益时，那个减益将会被同步施加给来源敌人单体。
被动能力无法对不可解除的减益生效。

Lv3：消耗“蜃楼”增益层数时，恢复最大体力值15%的体力值。

English:
Inquisitor. 
Daily enforcer of the Tribunal's will. Assists fishing vessels and guards their safety. 
First discovered the strange maritime plague. 
Initially clashed with investigators, now assists in tracing the plague's origin.
Chinese:
审判官。
日复一日在此地践行着审判庭的意志。平日会协助渔船捕猎，护卫渔船的安全。
海上的怪异的疫病现象，是她最早发现的。
曾经与调查团有过冲突，但现在已经加入调查团并协助调查海上疫病的源头。

English: You shall taste the bitter fruits of sin.
Chinese: 你将足尝恶行带来的苦果。
宁静的风声，悲泣与哀嚎。

English: No distinction between noble and commoner - all bow to law.
When using skills targeting allies or party, grant max Healing Gauge & Mystic Shield based on target's buffs & debuffs.
Chinese: 释放指向友军或全体友军的技能时，根据目标拥有的增益&减益数量分别提供最大体力值&神秘护盾。

English:
Trinity General School nun - earnest and devout. 
Her gentle smile and serene demeanor attract many students seeking counsel. Strives to become as capable as her seniors.
Chinese:
三一综合学园所属，修女会虔诚诚实的少女。
第一眼就给人可爱的印象，除此之外被她沉稳安静的气质和经常不断温柔地笑所吸引，前来咨询的学生络绎不绝。但她感觉自己还不够成熟，一直想要快点成为和前辈一样出色的修女。

English:
Trinity nun in gym uniform for the Kourin Taisai Festival. 
Volunteered as executive committee member hoping to pray for peace, but found constant conflicts. Her kind nature keeps involving her in troubles.
Chinese:
三一综合学园所属，为了参加晄轮大祭而换上体操服的修女会的修女。
听说这次大赛是为了祈祷基沃托斯和平而举办的，所以这才志愿担起了执行委员的工作，但实际做起来却发现这是份充满了不断的纷争和麻烦的工作。加之她原本就无法对别人放任不管的温柔性格，因此似乎不断被卷入各种麻烦中。

English:
Trinity nun and member of idol group "Antique Seraphim". Began idol activities to help others. Her wish to "bring happiness" aligns perfectly with idol essence. 
"Actually... I've always admired idols too."
Chinese:
所属于三一综合学园，既是修女会的一员也是这次偶像团「复古炽天使」的成员。起初是作为帮助他人而开始的偶像活动，然而玛丽的「只要能让大家幸福」的想法说不定与偶像的本质意外地非常的契合呢。
「其实......我也一直很憧憬偶像呢」

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 20% max Healing Gauge (&a).
Chinese: 获得最大体力值20%(&a)的烛火屏障。

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 30% max Healing Gauge (&a).
Chinese: 获得最大体力值30%(&a)的烛火屏障。

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 50% max Healing Gauge (&a).
Chinese: 获得最大体力值50%(&a)的烛火屏障。

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 50% max Healing Gauge (&a).
Chinese: 获得最大体力值50%(&a)的烛火屏障。

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 30% max Healing Gauge (&a).
Chinese: 获得最大体力值30%(&a)的烛火屏障。

English: Grant 1 stack of "Candlelight Protection" to other allies.
Chinese: 其他友军获得一层“烛光保护”。

English:
When Candlelight Barrier exists, remove 1 random debuff from self. 
Transferred debuffs are applied to all enemies.
Chinese:
烛火屏障存在时，清除自身随机一个减益。
清除的减益将会赋予所有敌人。

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 25% max Healing Gauge (&a). Protect all allies' Healing Gauge for 1 turn.
Chinese: 获得最大体力值25%(&a)的烛火屏障,所有友方保护体力极限1回合。

English:
Usable while stunned. 
Remove all debuffs from target and transfer to self. 
If transferred debuffs were from allies, Candle becomes the source.
Chinese:
可在无法行动时使用。
解除目标身上所有减益，将解除的减益转移到自身。
转移的减益如果使用者是友方，改为烛赋予。

English:
Usable while stunned.Cannot target other allies. 
When self-targeted: Clear all debuffs. Generate barrier based on debuff types, corresponding resistance rates, and max HP (corresponding &user resistance rate * max HP). 
When targeting enemies: Inflicts equivalent Pain damage.
Chinese:
可在无法行动时使用。不能指向其它友方。
指向自己时，清除所有减益。根据清除的减益类型、对应的减益抵抗率、自身最大体力值，生成烛火屏障。
（对应的&user减益抵抗率*最大体力值）
指向敌人时则变为造成等量痛苦伤害。

English:
Draw 2 skills. 
With Candlelight Barrier active, copy 1 random debuff from target to all enemies.
Chinese:
抽取两个技能。
烛火屏障存在的情况下，将目标拥有的随机一个减益以当前状态赋予所有敌人。

English: On cast: In Mirage Candle Shadow, debuff targets become all allies instead of "Candle". Synchronized debuffs apply to all enemies. Debuffs cannot be resisted.
Chinese: 释放后，蜃楼烛中影中被施加减益的对象条件由“烛”变为全体友军，同步施加减益的对象将变为全体敌人。减益施加时不会被抵抗。

English:
Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 30% max Healing Gauge (&a). 
On cast: Barrier gains &a additional points per debuff on Candle.
(Current total: &c)
Chinese:
获得最大体力值30%(&a)的烛火屏障。
释放时，自身每承受一个减益，烛火屏障额外获得当前烛的等级(&b)点。
当前总计:&c

English:
On cast: Candlelight debuffs gain "Enchantment Level" enhancements. 
Candlelight Thorns III: Damage multiplier changes from Attack Power to max Healing Gauge. 
Candlelight Protection IV: Also generates Candlelight Barrier equal to 20% of max Healing Gauge. 
Candlelight Pull V: Success rate: 150%. 
Candlelight Mending I: No longer consumes buff stacks when triggered. 
Candle Affix II: Removes and heals HP equal to half of base damage when at Death's Door.
Chinese:
释放后，烛光系列减益获得“附魔等级”强化。
烛光荆棘Ⅲ：伤害系数由攻击力变为最大体力值。
烛光保护Ⅳ：将同时生成自身最大体力值20%的烛火屏障。
烛光牵引Ⅴ：成功率：150%
烛光修补Ⅰ：触发时不再消耗增益层数。
烛光附加Ⅱ：濒死时解除并治疗相当于基础伤害一半的生命值。

English: If target has buffs, each buff grants all allies max HP equal to 10% of Healing Power.
Chinese: 若目标拥有增益，每个增益增加全体友军相当于10%治疗力的最大体力值。

English: If target has debuffs, each debuff grants all allies Mystic Shield equal to 10% of Healing Power.
Chinese: 若目标拥有减益，每个减益增加全体友军相当于10%治疗力的神秘护盾。

English: This skill’s passive max HP effect is doubled.
Chinese: 此技能触发被动能力的最大生命值效果提升2倍。

English: When allies are at Death's Door, grant an ally Mystic Shield equal to damage dealt.
Chinese: 队伍中存在濒死状态的友军时，给予一名濒死状态的友军神秘护盾，护盾值等同于伤害量。

English:
Also affects the caster when used. 
This skill does not trigger passive effects.
Chinese:
技能释放时对自身也有效果。
这个技能不会触发被动能力的效果。
优先抽取目标的一个技能。

English: This turn, when target uses a skill, apply "Dedicated Encouragement" with 20% healing effectiveness.
Chinese: 本回合目标释放技能时，以20%治疗量对其使用一次“奉献的鼓励”。

English:
Also heals self. 
This skill’s passive max HP/Mystic Shield effects become 1.5x.
Chinese:
同时治疗自己。
此技能给予被动能力的最大体力值或神秘护盾效果变为1.5倍。

English:
Does not trigger Mari’s passive. 
If target has passive buffs, the healing becomes Overheal.
Chinese:
这个技能不会触发玛丽的被动能力效果。
释放的目标拥有被动能力的效果增益时，变为超额治疗。

English:
Usable while disabled. 
Remove all debuffs from target.
Chinese:
无法行动时也能释放。
解除目标所有减益。

English: This skill’s passive max HP/Mystic Shield effects are multiplied by 5.
Chinese: 该技能触发被动能力的最大生命值、神秘护盾效果提升5倍。

English: Gain Candlelight Barrier equal to 30% of damage dealt.
Chinese: 获得伤害量30%的烛火屏障。

English: Gain 3 Candlelight Barrier points per debuff stack on target.
Chinese: 根据目标拥有的减益层数，每一个减益获得3点烛火屏障。
